userStories.title: Add CSS animation utilities and hover effects
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable CSS animation classes for consistent visual effects across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Create globals.css additions with card hover glow effect (box-shadow with purple #8B5CF6)

Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added card-hover, glow-purple, scale-hover classes plus fade-up, pulse-glow, float animations. Includes prefers-reduced-motion support.

Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added hero-gradient, section-gradient, surface-gradient, noise-texture, grid-pattern, and glow-orb classes. Application to layout sections deferred to component stories.

userStories.title: Create HeroSection component with image support

userStories.notes: Created HeroSection.tsx with size/align props, responsive images via next/image, gradient overlays, and animated text reveals using CSS classes from US-001/US-002.
